channel.title: Drum Kit Distortion Glitch
channel.description:
i found a glitch where if you want to add distortion to a drum kit in auxy with automation, you have to add distortion in the main drum kit first or it won't work.
to see what i’m talking about, i uploaded a video to youtube: https://youtu.be/QsLEtOd3AwY
video broken down into steps: 1. drum beat with no distortion 2. added distortion in automation but it doesn’t apply to the drums 3. added distortion to the main kit and then turned it back down 4. added distortion in automation and now it works

item.title: Drum Kit Distortion Glitch
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Worth shooting an email over to feedback@auxy.co from within app!

Read full topic

item.title: Drum Kit Distortion Glitch
item.dc:creator: Mr_Mooo
item.description:
i found a glitch where if you want to add distortion to a drum kit in auxy with automation, you have to add distortion in the main drum kit first or it won’t work.

to see what i’m talking about, i uploaded a video to youtube: https://youtu.be/QsLEtOd3AwY

video broken down into steps:

  1. drum beat with no distortion
  2. added distortion in automation but it doesn’t apply to the drums
  3. added distortion to the main kit and then turned it back down
  4. added distortion in automation and now it works
